thread.title: ‘Was This the Leaker of Fake News?’: Trump Takes to Twitter to Attack CIA Director John Brennan
thread.title_full: ‘Was This the Leaker of Fake News?’: Trump Takes to Twitter to Attack CIA Director John Brennan

author: Justin Baragona
title: ‘Was This the Leaker of Fake News?’: Trump Takes to Twitter to Attack CIA Director John Brennan
text:
‘Was This the Leaker of Fake News?’: Trump Takes to Twitter to Attack CIA Director John Brennan   8:20   
Earlier this evening,   used his Twitter account to take aim at Saturday Night Live over its blistering cold open, calling the program the “worst of NBC” and “really bad television.” 
Well, it appears the incoming POTUS wasn’t done for the day with his Twitter criticism. Responding to CIA Director John Brennan’s Fox News interview today in which the outgoing intel chief stated that Trump doesn’t seem to understand the Russian threat, Trump sent out these two tweets. . @FoxNews "Outgoing CIA Chief, John Brennan, blasts Pres-Elect Trump on Russia threat. Does not fully understand." Oh really, couldn't do… 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 16, 2017 much worse – just look at Syria (red line), Crimea, Ukraine and the build-up of Russian nukes. Not good! Was this the leaker of Fake News? 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 16, 2017 
Trump recently compared the intelligence agencies to Nazi Germany over his feeling that intelligence officials are leaking information to the press. Besides Brennan taking issue with Trump’s grasp of foreign policy and potential threats, the CIA head said it was “outrageous” for Trump to equate the intelligence community to Nazis. 
Trump has taken various shots at the intelligence community over the past weeks and months. He seemingly sided with WikiLeaks’ Julian Assange over the intelligence agencies and after the CIA concluded Russia interfered in the election to help Trump, he called the charge “ridiculous.”
